title: I need a rioter to help me
body: What I would like to say is that my other account has been hacked or has been blocked by an unknown source.I've been asking riot support to help me but I get nothing. My username of the hacked account is GodSerena12413 and hopefully that hacker doesn't get me banned.Also I would like to speak to a rioter not some robot who tells me to go riot support to go get a ticket.I tried  it already and didn't work.....League players I need yalls support {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We can help with this, but you have to make sure to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  This will also allow you to use an email you have access to in case it's been changed.  Our account team can help with recovery, but they'll have to first make sure you're the owner of the account.  If you already have a ticket number with the form filled, I can check on the status for you!
